oai_dc:dc.dc:title: University of Warwick HRI: Laboratory
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
Breeding, genetics and propagation
Soil biology
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: State of the art laboratories for molecular biology, plant science, soil science, plant pathology, entomology, microbial science. Controlled-temperature storage facilities. Shelf-and vase-life testing facilities.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Facility} University of Warwick HRI: Laboratory. Facility Leader(s): Collier, Dr Rosemary, University of Warwick.
